name: jsrl
description: JavaScript Roguelike Template - The basics to start building your own

scripts.package:win32: npm run build:electron && electron-packager dist/electron JSRL --overwrite --platform=win32 --out=dist --icon=./src/favicon.ico
scripts.package:linux: npm run build:electron && electron-packager dist/electron JSRL --overwrite --platform=linux --out=dist
scripts.package:mac: npm run build:electron && electron-packager dist/electron JSRL --overwrite --platform=darwin --out=dist
scripts.package:win32:pixi: npm run build:electron:pixi && electron-packager dist/electron JSRL --overwrite --platform=win32 --out=dist --icon=./src/favicon.ico
scripts.package:linux:pixi: npm run build:electron:pixi && electron-packager dist/electron JSRL --overwrite --platform=linux --out=dist
scripts.package:mac:pixi: npm run build:electron:pixi && electron-packager dist/electron JSRL --overwrite --platform=darwin --out=dist
